程序包 controller

类 FliInfoController

java.lang.Object
controller.FliInfoController
public class FliInfoController
extends java.lang.Object
This controller used for flight select and show flight detail operations
版本:
5.0
作者:
Yike Zhang

    • table1Controller

      public javax.swing.table.TableModel table1Controller​(java.lang.String number, int a) throws java.io.IOException
      This is used to format table data for scan login/ID+surname login
      参数:
      number - documentID or booking number
      a - login type
      返回:
      Table data in the correct format
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException

    • getFlightNoByBookingNo

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFlightNoByBookingNo​(java.lang.String bookingNo) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is used to get flight number by booking number
      参数:
      bookingNo - user's booking number
      返回:
      An arrayList used to record booking numbers
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException

    • getFlightInfoByFlightNo

      public java.util.ArrayList<Flight> getFlightInfoByFlightNo​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> flightNos) throws java.io.IOException
      This is used to search flight information through flightNo
      参数:
      flightNos - There is no check-in flight number in the user account
      返回:
      Flight information corresponding to the flight number
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException

    • getFlightNoBydocumentID

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFlightNoBydocumentID​(java.lang.String documentID) throws java.io.IOException
      This method is used to get a user's flight number by document ID
      参数:
      documentID - user's document ID
      返回:
      An arraylist to store user's un-checked flight number
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException

    • getDetailByFlightNo

      public Flight getDetailByFlightNo​(java.lang.String fliNo)
      This is used to get flight detail information by flight number
      参数:
      fliNo - flight number that user had chosen
      返回:
      flight information
